message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite low considering its value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $12,000 for this product.
